channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bath & Body Works beat 2024 expectations, but its stock fell 12%. Its CEO says she was ‘surprised’ to see Wall Street’s reaction
item.description: Tariffs and uncertain consumer spending dampened Wall Street's enthusiasm for the retailer.

item.title: How Elon Musk Executed His Takeover of the Federal Bureaucracy
item.description: The operation was driven with a frenetic focus by the billionaire, who channeled his resentment of regulatory oversight into a drastic overhaul of gov...

item.title: Oil Companies Wanted Trump to Lower Costs. Tariffs Are Raising Them.
item.description: The cost of steel pipe used to line oil and gas wells rose after President Trump said he would impose tariffs on steel and aluminum imports.

item.title: Consumers are cutting back spending at the fastest clip in 4 years
item.description: Unseasonably cold weather along with increased uncertainty over tariffs and trade are casting a pall on the economy.

item.title: Strike Brings Greece to a Halt: No Trains, No Planes and Huge Protests
item.description: Two years after the country’s deadliest rail disaster, many are still demanding greater safety and accountability.

item.title: After Insults and False Claims, Trump to Host Zelensky for Minerals Deal
item.description: President Trump will meet with President Volodymyr Zelensky of Ukraine on Friday after falsely asserting that Ukraine started the war with Russia and ...

item.title: Argentina’s Crypto Scandal Swindled Thousands. What Did Javier Milei Know?
item.description: A new cryptocurrency called $Libra bilked investors out of $250 million. It had been promoted by President Javier Milei.

item.title: Dead Athletes. Empty Stands. Billions to Keep Horse Racing Alive.
item.description: Let the sport of kings stand on its own.

item.title: As Phase One of the Israel-Gaza Truce Winds Down, What’s Next?
item.description: Israeli forces are supposed to begin withdrawing from the Philadelphi Corridor, a sensitive border zone between Gaza and Egypt, this weekend.

item.title: The legacy media is dead. Long live the legacy media
item.description: Our shared reality has always come from a mix of media, and once a medium has been instantiated, it never really goes away.

item.title: Bitcoin plunges 28% from all-time high as Trump pump turns into slump
item.description: Trump’s tariff threats are weighing on the crypto market as investors flee risky assets.

item.title: The DOGE-fueled firing of AI experts at the FDA endangers lives and worsens the hospital crisis
item.description: The FDA fired AI experts who conduct approvals for medical devices and might not get them back.
